Class WeaponFactory

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.WeaponFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Factory<Weapon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicPlayerWeaponFactory, BigAsteroidEnemyWeaponFactory, MissileEnemyWeaponFactory, SmallAsteroidEnemyWeaponFactory
public abstract class WeaponFactory extends Object implements Factory<Weapon>
Abstract factory class for creating instances of Weapon. This class provides common functionality for weapon factories, including the setup of projectile templates, attacker radius, and position, allowing for customization of different weapon types.
